bow: when did you stop breastfeeding and why curious when everyone stopped breastfeeding know you re supposed to get to year but one of those unlucky people for whom losing weight while breastfeeding is extremely difficult 40+ lb overweight and feel like slob since only fit into maternity clothes months pp gained 7lb months pp and then cut out sugar and flour and have only lost lost lb in months my husband thinks that it more important for my daughter to have happy mom than to have breastmilk but feel guilty and like was putting myself before her if stopped early to lose weight 10 months had been bleeding non stop for about months and it was getting worse ended up needing surgery and could breastfeed while on the meds was sad to stop but wish stopped earlier to take care of myself about mos my husband was sick of cosleeping and had bad fever that dried me up lot started to supplement with formula and my son lost interest shortly after so would say in the 7th month it was transitional then completely weaned by months actual feeding at the breast weeks went on to pump for almost full year with formula supplements then he went to normal almond milk and still pumped occasionally for him until he was about the reason was because had emergency gall bladder kidney stone removal surgery at weeks pp after section between having to pump and dump because of pain meds and not being able to hold my son or move much he got used to the bottle faster flow and would latch for more than minutes no matter what did at about 11 months was only feeding at night so it took some time to get out of that habit and by 15 months we were both done with it it was nice because she did need it or want it and it was happy separation maybe drawn out bit but that ok 13 months for my son found that breastfeeding made me lose weight how is it preventing you from losing weight if you feel you are finished breast feeding for whatever reason you have done great job feeding your baby the best stuff for months and should feel guilty if you decide to stop apparently breast feeding has the same effect as hormonal birth control for some people and causes weight gain lack of weight loss ve only lost lb in months pre baby have lost about 15 20 lb on this kind of diet fruit veg meat full fat dairy only my daughter was month and half when stopped she was in the nicu for the first two weeks of her life and pumping was hard kept it up until she came home and breastfed for another month then out of no where one day she had severe allergic reaction we did know what it was from initially but soon found that if even put breast milk on her skin the area would turn bright red and swell her doctor thought was crazy until showed her after that we had to stop since we did know what in my diet was causing it had an emergency section and gallbladder removed months later hugs just one thing after another deleted 15 months sort of wanted my body back to being just mine also my daughter has dairy allergy and selfishly wanted to be able to go back to eating dairy it was particularly hard transition so think my daughter was about ready too agree with your husband though whatever is going to make you the happiest is what you should do if it better to stop then celebrate how far you made it and move on to the next happy stage put him on cow milk and cut all daytime feedings at 11 months at 14 months we re still nursing at night and occasionally before naps but was able to lose all my pregnancy weight while breastfeeding weight loss was really important to me so know how you feel are you exercising started working out hard around months pp and have had great results but ve heard that for some women nursing just keeps the weight on the good news is you ve given your kid months of breast milk do feel guilty about weaning you ve done great job plus if you start weaning now it could take months to completely wean her maybe if you start cutting feeding week you ll start to lose saying is that there no guarantee that stopping breast feeding will solve your problems it burns huge number of calories maybe trying upping your exercise first it was the same with me did know if
